# ALFA NERO - 82m Oceanco Superyacht

> ALFA NERO is an 82-metre (269 ft) superyacht built by Oceanco in the Netherlands, launched in 2007 as hull Y702. She features award-winning exterior design by Nuvolari Lenard and interiors by Alberto Pinto. Comprehensively refitted in 2024, she is currently available for acquisition.

## Key Facts

- **Name**: ALFA NERO
- **Type**: Motor Yacht / Superyacht
- **Builder**: Oceanco (Netherlands)
- **Year**: 2007, Refitted 2024
- **Length**: 82m (269 ft)
- **Beam**: 14.2m (46.6 ft)
- **Draft**: 3.8m (12.5 ft)
- **Gross Tonnage**: 2,159 GT
- **Exterior Design**: Nuvolari Lenard
- **Interior Design**: Alberto Pinto
- **Guests**: 12 in 6 staterooms
- **Crew**: 28
- **Top Speed**: 20 knots
- **Cruising Speed**: 16 knots
- **Range**: 5,500 nautical miles at 14 knots
- **Engines**: Twin MTU 20V 4000 M91 (3,600 HP each)
- **Classification**: Lloyd's Register
- **Flag**: Malta

## Awards

- World Superyacht Awards 2008: Best Exterior Styling (Motor Yacht 65m+)
- World Superyacht Awards 2008: Best Interior Design (Motor Yacht 65m+)
- ShowBoats International Awards 2008
- ISS Design & Leadership Awards 2008

## Distinctive Features

- First superyacht with an infinity pool that converts to a helipad
- Full-beam master suite with private terrace
- Pleyel grand piano in the main salon
- Stone-clad sauna and full wellness spa at sea level
- Comprehensive 2024 refit updating all systems and interiors
